from snowflake.connector import connect
sql = '''CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE VICTIMS
(victim_unique_id	INT	NOT NULL,
case_id_pkey	VARCHAR(250)	,
victim_id	FLOAT	,
victim_role	VARCHAR(250)	,
victim_sex	VARCHAR(250)	,
victim_age	FLOAT	,
victim_degree_of_injury	VARCHAR(250)	,
victim_seating_position	VARCHAR(250)	,
victim_safety_equip_1	VARCHAR(250)	,
victim_safety_equip_2	VARCHAR(250)	,
victim_ejected	VARCHAR(250),
 PRIMARY KEY(victim_unique_id));'''
conn = connect(
    user = 'Pavan1625',
    password = 'Pavan@4498',
    account = 'rlb56414.us-east-1',
    warehouse ='DATA225_GRP3',
    database ='ACCIDENTS_SF',
    schema = 'PUBLIC')

cursor = conn.cursor()
cursor.execute(sql)
cursor.close()
